bug.author: lukeyeager
bug.summary: analyze_db tool should open prebuilt LMDBs as read-only
bug.description: You should never get a permission error while reading prebuilt LMDBs. <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/687269/9648178/613bd952-519a-11e5-9e27-2df5a81178b6.jpg></denchmark-link>
